class.name: ButtonGroup
class.description: Group of [Button]. All direct and indirect children buttons become radios. Only one allows being pressed. [member BaseButton.toggle_mode] should be [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_buttons
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [Button]s who have this as their [ButtonGroup] (see [member BaseButton.button_group]).

signal.name: pressed
signal.description: Emitted when one of the buttons of the group is pressed.
